# Introduction {-}

You find here all the subjects of the bioinformatics for pharmacy's practicals. For each session, some exercices are about the breast cancer and other are about other genomics's subjects. 

### Galaxy

For the practicals using walaxy, you need to log on to <https://usegalaxy.fr>. Then, to ensure you have sufficient resources, go to the url indicate at the begining of the practical.
